Hi again,

We are pretty sure the artist's name is Hideyuki $B1Q?o(B, but we cannot figure out the 
last character in the pseudonym. The first two characters are Ryû $BN5(B and jô $B>f(B, but 
we are not sure of the third character. It could be an abbreviation of "E" or $B1R(B. I 
checked Haynes as well, but no listing for this name. It is a fairly nice tsuba.

Gordon
